lyric:
[00:00.30]Walkin' through the fire, please don't let me go
[00:09.38]Take me to the river, I need you to know
[00:19.07]I'm burnin' up
[00:20.73]Come put me out
[00:22.57]Come and put me out
[00:24.30]I'm burnin' up
[00:25.83]Come put me out
[00:27.30]Come and put me out
[00:29.02]I'm burnin' up up up
[00:33.96]I'm burnin' up up up
[00:48.33]I'm burning
[01:08.36]Hot in the kitchen like a thousand degrees
[01:12.99]That's how I'm feelin' when you're next to me
[01:17.67]I got a fever, tell me, what did you do?
[01:22.55]Temperature risin' when I look at you, look at you
[01:27.58]Subliminal, ***
[01:29.72]Drippin' in, sweat
[01:32.01]I'm losing my, breath
[01:34.39](Huh, huh, huh, huh)
[01:36.69]Look what I've, found
[01:39.22]It's 'bout to go, down
[01:41.66]I want it right, now
[01:44.04](Huh, huh, huh, huh)
[01:45.72]I'm burnin' up
[01:47.24]Come put me out
[01:48.87]Come and put me out
[01:50.44]I'm burnin' up
[01:51.87]Come put me out
[01:53.59]Come and put me out
[01:55.27]I'm burnin' up
[01:56.80]Come put me out
[01:58.52]Come and put me out
[02:00.09]I'm burnin' up
[02:01.62]Come put me out
[02:04.06]Put me put me
[02:09.70]Put me put me
[02:14.12]Put me put me up
[02:25.10]I got the matches, you got the gasoline
[02:29.11]Light up the floor like it's Billie Jean
[02:33.23]The way we're movin', by the end of the sun
[02:38.87]They're gonna have to pull the fire, f-fire alarm
[02:44.47]So criminal, ***
[02:46.80]Drippin' in, sweat
[02:49.13]I'm losing my, breath
[02:51.42](Huh, huh, huh, huh)
[02:53.55]Look what I've, found
[02:56.08]It's 'bout to go, down
[02:58.41]I want it right, now
[03:01.08]2 Chainz!
[03:03.37]Everything hot like it's fresh off the grill
[03:05.45]Million dollar grill look fresh on the hill
[03:07.94]Plus I'm 6'5", she need to step in some heels
[03:10.22]'Fore she step up in here you need to step up your gear
[03:12.77]Wish a Lamborghini had four doors (four doors)
[03:14.65]From the corner store to the corridor (corridor)
[03:17.04]Me and my homie on the dance floor
[03:19.42]White girl in the middle, looking like an Oreo
[03:21.87]2, 4, 5 we can burn up
[03:24.35]Turn down for what, ***** turn up
[03:26.89]mercy ain't  learn nothin' black day
[03:29.63]Back in the day used to down with a burn coat
[03:31.29](I'm burnin' up)
[03:34.00]Light got the Lord on the top floor
[03:36.24]In a Ford, wearin' Tom Ford
[03:36.37]Walk in the club and her ass start clappin'
[03:39.01]Tell shawty I want an encore
[03:41.39]I'm burnin' up
tlyric:
[by:Silriver]
[00:00.30]穿越火线，请将我抱起
[00:09.38]让你知道如鱼得水，鱼水之欢
[00:19.07]我燃起熊熊大火
[00:20.73]来吧 将我扑灭
[00:22.57]将我的火焰扑灭
[00:24.30]我燃起熊熊大火
[00:25.83]来吧 将我扑灭
[00:27.30]将我的火焰扑灭
[00:29.02]我的心燃烧起来
[00:33.96]快要沸腾
[00:48.33]好惹火
[01:08.36]厨房里热度像有1000℃
[01:12.99]这就是我的感觉当你在我身旁
[01:17.67]我像是发烧，告诉我你做了什么
[01:22.55]温度在上升，当我看着你
[01:27.58]潜意识的欲望
[01:29.72]汗水滴落 蠢蠢欲动
[01:32.01]我无法呼吸
[01:34.39]（谜之喘息）
[01:36.69]看看我发现的
[01:39.22]快要平静下来
[01:41.66]我现在就想要
[01:44.04]（谜之喘息）
[01:45.72]我燃起熊熊大火
[01:47.24]来吧 将我扑灭
[01:48.87]将我的火焰扑灭
[01:50.44]我燃起熊熊大火
[01:51.87]来吧 将我扑灭
[01:53.59]将我的火焰扑灭
[01:55.27]我燃起熊熊大火
[01:56.80]来吧 将我扑灭
[01:58.52]将我的火焰扑灭
[02:00.09]我燃起熊熊大火
[02:01.62]来吧 将我扑灭
[02:04.06]将我的火焰扑灭
[02:09.70]将我的火焰扑灭
[02:14.12]将我的火焰扑灭
[02:25.10]我有引擎，你有燃料
[02:29.11]点燃地面，就像是火焰构建一切
[02:33.23]我们移动，直至靠近太阳尽头
[02:38.87]他们要带领那火焰
[02:44.47]像个罪犯般 想入非非
[02:46.80]汗水滴落 蠢蠢欲动
[02:49.13]我无法呼吸
[02:51.42]（谜之喘息）
[02:53.55]看看我发现的
[02:56.08]快要平静下来
[02:58.41]我现在就想要
[03:01.08]默契三人组
[03:03.37]一切都是炙热的
[03:05.45]就像是价值百万的烧烤在山丘上新鲜出炉
[03:07.94]对了,我165cm，她需要踩上高跟鞋
[03:10.22]她需要踩上高跟鞋，你需要加强你的装备
[03:12.77]真希望兰博基尼有四个门
[03:14.65]从街角商店到走廊
[03:17.04]我和我的闺蜜们在舞池
[03:19.42]白人女孩在中间舞蹈，看起来像个奥利奥
[03:21.87]我燃起熊熊大火
[03:24.35]别停下继续，黑人靠近
[03:26.89]压抑天性,什么也得不到
[03:29.63]燃烧掉以前的死气沉沉的夜店
[03:31.29](我活力四射)
[03:34.00]感觉上面有光打在我身上
[03:36.24]在一辆福特车里，穿着汤姆·福特牌时装
[03:36.37]走进夜店，她的臀部扭起桑巴舞
[03:39.01]告诉美女，我想再嗨一次
[03:41.39]我无限储能
